item.title: Moths coming to the fire of Bushmen by night foretell the killing of certain kinds of game
item.summary: The coming of different kinds of moths to the fire at night foretells the killing of certain types of game. The moths resemble different types of game.
item.comments: 1) pp.5173-5260 were translated in April 1912; except for pp.5206-5209, 2) See also The Moon, 3) This story is found in Book V-16
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
